@usedefaults
{{timestamp}}

@block

@row
@col 4
{{actions:
- display: Reload all Services
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/reload
  showresponse: True

- display: Execute blueprint
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/executeBlueprint
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Init
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/init
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: force
    label: Force init
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Install
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/install
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: force
    label: Force install
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: async
    label: Async
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: True
      value: True
    - label: False
      value: False
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text

- display: Execute action
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/executeAction
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: action
    type: text
    label: action name
    placeholder: 'install'
    required: True
  - name: force
    label: Force install
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: False
      value: False
    - label: True
      value: True
  - name: role
    label: Role
    type: text
  - name: instance
    label: Instance
    type: text
  - name: async
    label: Async
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: True
      value: True
    - label: False
      value: False


- display: Delete service
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/deleteService
  showresponse: True
  input:
  - name: repository
    type: hidden
    value: $$repo
  - name: force
    type: hidden
    value: True
  - name: role
    type: text
    label: Role
    required: True
  - name: instance
    type: text
    label: Instance
    required: True
  - name: uninstall
    label: Uninstall service before deletion
    type: dropdown
    values:
    - label: True
      value: True
    - label: False
      value: False

- display: Commit
  action: /restmachine/cockpit/atyourservice/commit
}}
